ISSUE.TITLE: Cache busting
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Please enter the following details** Node: **v12.22.6** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **false** Database: **mysql2** ProjectOnRootDB: **true** RootDB: **mysql2** PackageVersion: **0.81.1** **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Have NocoDB deployed 2. Update NocoDB (e.g. by incrementing the Docker version) 3. Visit the page: cached resources give an error. **Expected behavior** The returned HTML should make sure that the cached resources are invalidated.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: test(cypress) sql view Signed-off-by: Raju Udava <sivadstala@gmail.com>
